languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, если уж вы лишили меня последней надежды, то лучше убейте меня здесь и сейчас. Я не могу так жить больше. Вы не представляете, каково это — каждый день только и делать, что ждать, когда твое тело порвет на куски, чтобы из него полезли полчища демонов. Когда все твои мысли не твои, и ты не отличаешь, где видения будущего, а где просто ночные кошмары. Просто... просто закончите все это. Пожалуйста. Я... устала".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, если уж вы лишили меня последней надежды, то лучше убейте меня здесь и сейчас. Я не могу так жить больше. Вы не представляете каково это — каждый день только и делать, что ждать когда твое тело порвет на куски, чтобы из него полезли полчища демонов. Когда все твои мысли не твои, и ты не отличаешь где видения будущего, а где просто ночные кошмары. Просто... просто закончите все это. Пожалуйста".

languages.text: "Lord Captain, since you've robbed me of my last hope, you might as well kill me here and now. I can't go on like this. You don't know what it's like to wait day in and day out for your body to burst into pieces only to spawn a horde of daemons. When none of your thoughts are your own, when you can't tell a vision of the future from a normal nightmare. Just... just end it. Please. I'm... tired."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, если уж вы лишили меня последней надежды, то лучше убейте меня здесь и сейчас. Я не могу так жить больше. Вы не представляете, каково это — каждый день только и делать, что ждать, когда твое тело порвет на куски, чтобы из него полезли полчища демонов. Когда все твои мысли не твои, и ты не отличаешь, где видения будущего, а где просто ночные кошмары. Просто... просто закончите все это. Пожалуйста. Я... устала".

You don't know what it's like to wait day in and day out for your body to burst into pieces only to spawn a horde of daemons. When none of your thoughts are your own, when you can't tell a vision of the future from a normal nightmare. Just... just end it. Please. I'm... tired."

When none of your thoughts are your own, when you can't tell a vision of the future from a normal nightmare. Just... just end it. Please. I'm... tired."

"Lord Captain, since you've robbed me of my last hope, you might as well kill me here and now. I can't go on like this. You don't know what it's like to wait day in and day out for your body to burst into pieces only to spawn a horde of daemons. When none of your thoughts are your own, when you can't tell a vision of the future from a normal nightmare. Just... just end it. Please. I'm... tired."

"Lord Captain, since you've robbed me of my last hope, you might as well kill me here and now. I can't go on like this. You don't know what it's like to wait day in and day out for your body to burst into pieces only to spawn a horde of daemons. When none of your thoughts are your own, when you can't tell a vision of the future from a normal nightmare. Just... just end it. Please. I'm... tired."

languages.text: “舰长大人，既然你夺走了我最后的希望，你还不如现在就杀了我。我已经坚持不下去了。日复一日地等死，心知肚明你的身体会变成一大群恶魔的饵食，你根本不明白这种感觉多么恐怖。当你的想法全都不属于你自己，当你无法分辨眼前的究竟是未来的幻象，还是普通的噩梦……来吧……结束这一切吧，拜托了。我……已经累了。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, since you've robbed me of my last hope, you might as well kill me here and now. I can't go on like this. You don't know what it's like to wait day in and day out for your body to burst into pieces only to spawn a horde of daemons. When none of your thoughts are your own, when you can't tell a vision of the future from a normal nightmare. Just... just end it. Please. I'm... tired."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，既然你夺走了我最后的希望，你还不如现在就杀了我。我已经坚持不下去了。日复一日地等死，心知肚明你的身体会变成一大群恶魔的饵食，你根本不明白这种感觉多么恐怖。当你的想法全都不属于你自己，当你无法分辨眼前的究竟是未来的幻象，还是普通的噩梦……来吧……结束这一切吧，拜托了。我……已经累了。”

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, ya que me ha arrebatado mi última esperanza, puede matarme aquí y ahora. No puedo seguir viviendo así. No sabe lo que es esperar cada día a que tu cuerpo estalle en pedazos para convocar una horda de daemons. Que ninguno de tus pensamientos sea tuyo, que las visiones del futuro sean indistinguibles de las pesadillas. Quiero... quiero que le ponga fin. Por favor. Estoy... cansada».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, since you've robbed me of my last hope, you might as well kill me here and now. I can't go on like this. You don't know what it's like to wait day in and day out for your body to burst into pieces only to spawn a horde of daemons. When none of your thoughts are your own, when you can't tell a vision of the future from a normal nightmare. Just... just end it. Please. I'm... tired."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, ya que me ha arrebatado mi última esperanza, puede matarme aquí y ahora. No puedo seguir viviendo así. No sabe lo que es esperar cada día a que tu cuerpo estalle en pedazos para convocar una horda de daemons. Que ninguno de tus pensamientos sea tuyo, que las visiones del futuro sean indistinguibles de las pesadillas. Quiero... quiero que le ponga fin. Por favor. Estoy... cansada».

languages.text: "Lord Captain, da Ihr mich meiner letzten Hoffnung beraubt habt, könnt Ihr mich auch ebenso gut hier und jetzt töten. Ich kann so nicht weiterleben. Ihr wisst nicht, wie das ist, tagein, tagaus darauf zu warten, dass der eigene Körper in tausend Teile zerspringt und eine Horde von Dämonen hervorbringt. Wie das ist, wenn kein einziger Gedanke der eigene ist, wenn man eine Vision der Zukunft nicht von einem normalen Albtraum unterscheiden kann. B-Beendet es einfach. Bitte. Ich bin ... müde."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, since you've robbed me of my last hope, you might as well kill me here and now. I can't go on like this. You don't know what it's like to wait day in and day out for your body to burst into pieces only to spawn a horde of daemons. When none of your thoughts are your own, when you can't tell a vision of the future from a normal nightmare. Just... just end it. Please. I'm... tired."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, da Ihr mich meiner letzten Hoffnung beraubt habt, könnt Ihr mich auch ebenso gut hier und jetzt töten. Ich kann so nicht weiterleben. Ihr wisst nicht, wie das ist, tagein, tagaus darauf zu warten, dass der eigene Körper in tausend Teile zerspringt und eine Horde von Dämonen hervorbringt. Wie das ist, wenn kein einziger Gedanke der eigene ist, wenn man eine Vision der Zukunft nicht von einem normalen Albtraum unterscheiden kann. B-Beendet es einfach. Bitte. Ich bin ... müde."

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、私の最後の望みを奪ったのなら、ついでにここで私を殺していって。もう耐えられないわ。ディーモンの群れを生んで自分の体が壊れるその時を、来る日も来る日も待つことがどんなことか、あなたには分からないでしょう。自分の考えが自分のものでなくなって、未来のビジョンとただの悪夢の区別もつかなくなる。もう…もう終わらせて。お願いよ。私は…疲れたの」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, since you've robbed me of my last hope, you might as well kill me here and now. I can't go on like this. You don't know what it's like to wait day in and day out for your body to burst into pieces only to spawn a horde of daemons. When none of your thoughts are your own, when you can't tell a vision of the future from a normal nightmare. Just... just end it. Please. I'm... tired."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、私の最後の望みを奪ったのなら、ついでにここで私を殺していって。もう耐えられないわ。ディーモンの群れを生んで自分の体が壊れるその時を、来る日も来る日も待つことがどんなことか、あなたには分からないでしょう。自分の考えが自分のものでなくなって、未来のビジョンとただの悪夢の区別もつかなくなる。もう…もう終わらせて。お願いよ。私は…疲れたの」

languages.text: « Vous pouvez tout aussi bien me tuer ici et maintenant, puisque vous m'avez privée de mon dernier espoir, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je ne peux plus continuer comme ça. Vous ignorez ce que c'est que d'attendre jour après jour que votre corps explose en morceaux pour donner naissance à une horde de démons. Quand aucune de vos pensées n'est vraiment la vôtre, quand vous ne pouvez pas faire la différence entre une vision de l'avenir et un cauchemar ordinaire. Mettez un terme à tout cela. Je vous en supplie. Je suis...épuisée. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, since you've robbed me of my last hope, you might as well kill me here and now. I can't go on like this. You don't know what it's like to wait day in and day out for your body to burst into pieces only to spawn a horde of daemons. When none of your thoughts are your own, when you can't tell a vision of the future from a normal nightmare. Just... just end it. Please. I'm... tired."

traits.locale_text: « Vous pouvez tout aussi bien me tuer ici et maintenant, puisque vous m'avez privée de mon dernier espoir, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je ne peux plus continuer comme ça. Vous ignorez ce que c'est que d'attendre jour après jour que votre corps explose en morceaux pour donner naissance à une horde de démons. Quand aucune de vos pensées n'est vraiment la vôtre, quand vous ne pouvez pas faire la différence entre une vision de l'avenir et un cauchemar ordinaire. Mettez un terme à tout cela. Je vous en supplie. Je suis...épuisée. »

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, benim son umudumu yok ettiğine göre beni burada hemen öldürebilirsin. Böyle devam edemem. Her gün bedeninin patlayıp binlerce iblis fışkırtacağı korkusuyla yaşamak nedir bilmiyorsun. Düşüncelerinin hiçbiri senin değilken, gelecek görülerini normal bir kâbustan ayırt edemezken yaşamak nedir bilmiyorsun. Bitir işimi. Lütfen. Çok yoruldum."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, since you've robbed me of my last hope, you might as well kill me here and now. I can't go on like this. You don't know what it's like to wait day in and day out for your body to burst into pieces only to spawn a horde of daemons. When none of your thoughts are your own, when you can't tell a vision of the future from a normal nightmare. Just... just end it. Please. I'm... tired."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, benim son umudumu yok ettiğine göre beni burada hemen öldürebilirsin. Böyle devam edemem. Her gün bedeninin patlayıp binlerce iblis fışkırtacağı korkusuyla yaşamak nedir bilmiyorsun. Düşüncelerinin hiçbiri senin değilken, gelecek görülerini normal bir kâbustan ayırt edemezken yaşamak nedir bilmiyorsun. Bitir işimi. Lütfen. Çok yoruldum."
